means: 感到愤恨的，表示愤恨的

sentence.Network_en: They're resentful that outsiders presume to meddle in their affairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对外人擅自干预他们的事务非常愤慨。

sentence.Network_en: At first I felt very resentful and angry about losing my job.
sentence.Network_cn: 起初我对丢掉工作感到非常怨恨和恼怒。

sentence.Network_en: He turned away in sullen, resentful silence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他闷闷不乐、心怀怨恨、一言不发地转过身去了。

apart from any moral considerations this a stupid method of training , for it produces a resentful animal who at a later stage may well turn man-killer .撇开道义方面的考虑，这种调驯法是愚蠢的，因为这种方法会使大象“怀恨在心”，在以后某个阶段它很可能变成伤人的动物。

entry.def: If you are resentful, you feel resentment.

example.ex: At first I felt very resentful and angry about losing my job...
example.tran: 起初我对丢掉工作感到非常怨恨和恼怒。

example.ex: He turned away in sullen, resentful silence.
example.tran: 他闷闷不乐、心怀怨恨、一言不发地转过身去了。

means.word_mean: 1. full of or marked by resentment or indignant ill will;

sentences.sentence: "resentful at the way he was treated"

auth_sentence.content: Believe it or not, colleagues are not resentful.
auth_sentence.res_content: Believe it or not, colleagues are not resentful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Believe it or not, colleagues are not resentful.

auth_sentence.content: Even a little resentful, too, once or twice.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even a little resentful, too, once or twice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even a little resentful, too, once or twice.

auth_sentence.content: Some relatives were resentful and made false accusations against him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some relatives were resentful and made false accusations against him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some relatives were resentful and made false accusations against him.

means.word_mean: 感到愤恨的, 表示愤恨的, 憎恨的

sentences.en: He felt deeply resentful towards his ex-wife.
She felt resentful at the way she had been treated.
sentences.cn: 她对所受到的对待恼怒不已。

sentences.en: He was very resentful of their success.
sentences.cn: 他对他们的成功愤愤不平。

sentences.en: She was resentful of the way of his speaking.
sentences.cn: 她对他的讲话方式不满。
